personal.name: Sahil Gupta
personal.title: Senior Software Engineer | Agentic AI & Multi-Agent Systems Specialist
personal.bio: Passionate Senior Software Engineer specializing in agentic AI, multi-agent systems, and full-stack development. Currently building cutting-edge AI solutions at RevSure AI with expertise in cloud computing, DevOps, and modern web technologies.
personal.tagline: Building the future of AI-powered applications

about.description: I'm a Senior Software Engineer with a passion for building intelligent, scalable systems. My expertise spans agentic AI, multi-agent architectures, full-stack development, and cloud infrastructure. I thrive on solving complex technical challenges and creating innovative solutions that push the boundaries of what's possible with AI.
highlights: Leading development of sophisticated voice agent platforms for logistics operations
Expert in agentic AI architectures and multi-agent systems
5+ years of experience in full-stack development and team leadership
Strong background in cloud computing (AWS, GCP) and DevOps practices

workExperience.subtitle: 5+ years of professional experience building scalable software solutions, leading engineering teams, and architecting AI-powered systems across fintech, logistics, and monitoring platforms.

work.description: Leading development of agentic AI systems and multi-agent architectures. Building sophisticated voice agent platforms using React, TypeScript, FastAPI, and cutting-edge AI technologies.
achievements: Architected and built voice agent platform for logistics operations with adaptive conversation flows
Implemented real-time AI systems using Retell AI and Supabase
Led integration of advanced AI orchestration frameworks

work.description: Managed a team of 10+ engineers, overseeing full-stack development and infrastructure projects.
achievements: Led team of 10+ developers in building monitoring solutions
Implemented CI/CD pipelines and DevOps best practices
Reduced deployment time by 60% through automation

work.description: Developed full-stack web applications and cloud-based solutions.
achievements: Built responsive web applications using modern frameworks

work.description: Developed financial technology solutions and payment systems.

education.description: Advanced study in Generative AI, Agentic AI systems, and cutting-edge AI technologies.
highlights: Focus on LLM applications and multi-agent systems
Advanced RAG architectures and vector databases
Model Context Protocol (MCP) and agent orchestration

projects.name: Voice Agent Platform for Logistics
projects.description: Sophisticated AI-powered voice agent system for handling driver check-ins and emergency situations in logistics operations.
projects.longDescription: Built an advanced voice agent platform using React, TypeScript, FastAPI, and Retell AI. Features adaptive conversation flows, real-time processing, and intelligent emergency handling. Integrated with Supabase for data persistence and implemented complex state management for multi-turn conversations.
highlights: Adaptive conversation flows for complex scenarios
Real-time AI processing and decision making

projects.name: Multi-Agent Workflow Orchestration
projects.description: Exploring advanced workflow orchestration using Temporal as a replacement for LangGraph in AI applications.
projects.longDescription: Research and implementation project investigating how Temporal can provide more robust infrastructure for AI agent orchestration. Includes comparative analysis, architecture design, and proof-of-concept implementations.

projects.name: Messaging System at Scale
projects.description: Architected a massively scalable messaging system designed to support billions of users.
projects.longDescription: Comprehensive database and system architecture design for a global-scale messaging platform. Includes sharding strategies, caching layers, real-time delivery mechanisms, and high-availability considerations.

projects.name: Agentic RAG System
projects.description: Advanced Retrieval-Augmented Generation system with intelligent agent orchestration.
projects.longDescription: Built a sophisticated RAG system featuring multi-agent collaboration, dynamic retrieval strategies, and context-aware generation. Implements advanced chunking strategies, hybrid search, and intelligent routing.

sections.summary: Senior Software Engineer with 5+ years of experience specializing in agentic AI, multi-agent systems, and full-stack development. Proven track record of leading teams, architecting scalable solutions, and delivering innovative AI-powered applications. Expert in cloud computing, DevOps, and modern web technologies.
highlights: Led development of sophisticated AI voice agent platforms
Managed team of 10+ engineers at Rugged Monitoring
Expert in agentic AI architectures and LLM applications
M.Tech in Cloud Computing from BITS Pilani
Currently pursuing PGP in GenAI/Agentic AI from IIT Roorkee
